text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a OBSA
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ConditionDetectedIssueCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-AgeDetectedIssueCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ReactionDetectedIssueCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-RelatedReactionDetectedIssueCode

name: ObservationDetectedIssueCode
title: ObservationDetectedIssueCode
description: Proposed therapy may be inappropriate or contraindicated due to conditions or characteristics of the patient
